emails.subject: Cannot connect to VPN from home
emails.body_preview: Hi, I am unable to connect to the VPN from home. The client shows a timeout error after about 30 seconds.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

I am unable to connect to the VPN from home. The client shows a timeout error after about 30 seconds. I have tried restarting my laptop and my router but the issue persists. Could you please help?

emails.subject: RE: Cannot connect to VPN from home
emails.body_preview: Hi Alice, I've checked the VPN logs and it looks like your certificate may have expired. I'll reset it now.
emails.body_content:
Hi Alice,

I've checked the VPN logs and it looks like your certificate may have expired. I'll reset it now and send you the new connection profile. Please try again in about 10 minutes.

emails.subject: New laptop setup required for new starter
emails.body_preview: We have a new starter joining the team on Monday. Could you please arrange a laptop setup?
emails.body_content:
Hi,

We have a new starter joining the team on Monday. Could you please arrange a laptop setup with the standard software suite? They will need access to the shared drives and email.

emails.subject: RE: New laptop setup required for new starter
emails.body_preview: Hi Bob, we have a laptop ready from stock. I will begin the build process today.
emails.body_content:
Hi Bob,

Thanks for letting us know. We have a laptop ready from stock and I will begin the build process today. Could you confirm the new starter's full name and department so I can set up their account?

emails.subject: Outlook keeps crashing when opening attachments
emails.body_preview: Outlook crashes every time I try to open a PDF or Word attachment. This started happening this morning.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

Outlook crashes every time I try to open a PDF or Word attachment. This started happening this morning after a Windows update was installed overnight. I have tried restarting but it keeps happening.

emails.subject: RE: Outlook keeps crashing when opening attachments
emails.body_preview: Hi Claire, this is a known issue with the latest update. I am going to run a repair on your Office installation.
emails.body_content:
Hi Claire,

This is a known issue with the latest Windows update affecting some Outlook installations. I am going to run a repair on your Office installation remotely. This should take about 15 minutes and you may see a progress bar appear.

emails.subject: Shared drive access request for Finance folder
emails.body_preview: I need access to the Finance shared drive folder for a cross-departmental project.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

I need access to the Finance shared drive folder for a cross-departmental project I have been assigned to. My manager has approved this request. Could you please grant me read-only access?

emails.subject: RE: Shared drive access request for Finance folder
emails.body_preview: Hi David, I will need written approval from the Finance department head before I can grant this access.
emails.body_content:
Hi David,

Thanks for your request. For security compliance, I will need written approval from the Finance department head before I can grant access to their shared drive. Could you arrange for them to send confirmation to our helpdesk email?

emails.subject: Printer not working on 3rd floor
emails.body_preview: The printer on the 3rd floor near the kitchen area is showing an error and not printing anything.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

The printer on the 3rd floor near the kitchen area is showing an error message on its display and is not printing anything. Several people have tried and we are all getting the same issue. The error says "Service Required".

emails.subject: RE: Printer not working on 3rd floor
emails.body_preview: Hi Emma, I have logged a call with the printer manufacturer for a service visit. In the meantime, please use the printer on the 2nd floor.
emails.body_content:
Hi Emma,

I have logged a call with the printer manufacturer for a service visit, which should happen within 24 hours. In the meantime, please use the printer on the 2nd floor as an alternative. I will let you know once the 3rd floor printer is back in service.

emails.subject: Unable to access SharePoint site after password reset
emails.body_preview: Since resetting my password yesterday, I can no longer access the project SharePoint site. Other sites work fine.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

Since resetting my password yesterday, I can no longer access the project SharePoint site. Other SharePoint sites work fine. I keep getting an access denied error. Could you please investigate?

emails.subject: RE: Unable to access SharePoint site after password reset
emails.body_preview: Hi Frank, this looks like a token caching issue. Please clear your browser cache and try signing in again.
emails.body_content:
Hi Frank,

This looks like a token caching issue that sometimes occurs after a password reset. Please clear your browser cache completely, close all browser windows, and then try signing in again. If the issue persists, let me know and I will check the SharePoint permissions directly.

emails.subject: Request for additional monitor
emails.body_preview: I would like to request a second monitor for my desk to improve productivity.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

I would like to request a second monitor for my desk. I work with multiple applications and spreadsheets simultaneously and a dual-monitor setup would greatly improve my productivity. My manager has approved this request.

emails.subject: RE: Request for additional monitor
emails.body_preview: Hi Grace, we have some monitors in stock. I will arrange for one to be delivered to your desk this week.
emails.body_content:
Hi Grace,

Thanks for your request. We have some 24-inch monitors in stock. I will arrange for one to be delivered to your desk and set up for you later this week. I will let you know the exact date once I have confirmed with our hardware team.

emails.subject: Wi-Fi keeps disconnecting in meeting room B
emails.body_preview: The Wi-Fi in meeting room B keeps dropping out during video calls. This is happening to everyone in the room.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

The Wi-Fi in meeting room B keeps dropping out during video calls. This is happening to everyone in the room, not just my device. It seems to disconnect for about 30 seconds and then reconnect. This has been going on for the past two days.

emails.subject: RE: Wi-Fi keeps disconnecting in meeting room B
emails.body_preview: Hi Harry, I will check the access point serving that room. There may be interference from the new equipment installed nearby.
emails.body_content:
Hi Harry,

Thanks for reporting this. I will check the access point serving meeting room B. There may be interference from the new AV equipment that was installed nearby last week. I will run some diagnostics this afternoon and let you know what I find.

emails.subject: Software licence renewal for Adobe Creative Suite
emails.body_preview: Our Adobe Creative Suite licences expire next month. Please can you arrange renewal for the design team?
emails.body_content:
Hi,

Our Adobe Creative Suite licences expire next month and we need to renew for the 8 users in the design team. Could you please arrange the renewal and let us know the cost? We have budget approval already.

emails.subject: RE: Software licence renewal for Adobe Creative Suite
emails.body_preview: Hi Isla, I have contacted our Adobe reseller and requested a quote for 8 licences. I will share the quote once received.
emails.body_content:
Hi Isla,

I have contacted our Adobe reseller and requested a quote for 8 Creative Suite licences. I should have the quote back within a couple of days and will share it with you for approval. Once approved, I can process the renewal immediately.

emails.subject: Email delivery delays to external recipients
emails.body_preview: Emails to external addresses are taking over an hour to arrive. Internal emails work fine.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

Emails to external addresses are taking over an hour to arrive, and some are not arriving at all. Internal emails between colleagues work fine. This is affecting several people in our department and is causing problems with client communication.

emails.subject: RE: Email delivery delays to external recipients
emails.body_preview: Hi Jack, I am investigating the mail queue on our Exchange server. There appears to be a backlog that I am working to clear.
emails.body_content:
Hi Jack,

I am investigating the mail queue on our Exchange server. There appears to be a significant backlog of outbound messages. I have identified the cause as a DNS resolution issue with our outbound mail relay. I am working to resolve this urgently and will keep you updated.

emails.subject: Server room temperature alert
emails.body_preview: The monitoring system has triggered a high temperature alert for the main server room. Current reading is 28C.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

The monitoring system has triggered a high temperature alert for the main server room. The current reading is 28C, which is above our 25C threshold. I suspect the air conditioning unit may be failing. This needs urgent attention to prevent equipment damage.

emails.subject: RE: Server room temperature alert
emails.body_preview: Update: I have called the HVAC contractor. They can attend tomorrow morning. I have set up portable cooling fans as a temporary measure.
emails.body_content:
Update on the server room temperature issue.

I have called the HVAC contractor and they can attend tomorrow morning. In the meantime, I have set up two portable cooling fans in the server room and opened the raised floor vents. Temperature has stabilised at 27C for now.

emails.subject: Deploy updated CRM module to production
emails.body_preview: The updated CRM module has passed UAT. Please schedule a production deployment.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

The updated CRM module has passed user acceptance testing and is ready for production deployment. Please schedule this for the next available maintenance window. The release notes and deployment checklist are attached to the change request.

emails.subject: RE: Deploy updated CRM module to production
emails.body_preview: Hi Karen, I have reviewed the deployment checklist. We will schedule this for the maintenance window on Saturday evening.
emails.body_content:
Hi Karen,

I have reviewed the deployment checklist and everything looks good. We will schedule the production deployment for the maintenance window on Saturday evening between 22:00 and 02:00. I will send a notification to all stakeholders before we begin.

emails.subject: Investigate intermittent network timeouts on VLAN 10
emails.body_preview: Multiple users on VLAN 10 are experiencing intermittent network timeouts. This has been happening for the past few days.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

Multiple users on VLAN 10 are experiencing intermittent network timeouts, particularly when accessing internal applications. This has been happening for the past few days and seems to be getting worse. Can the network team investigate?

emails.subject: RE: Investigate intermittent network timeouts on VLAN 10
emails.body_preview: Hi James, I have started packet captures on the VLAN 10 switches. Initial analysis suggests a possible spanning tree loop.
emails.body_content:
Hi James,

I have started packet captures on the VLAN 10 switches. Initial analysis suggests a possible spanning tree loop caused by a misconfigured port on switch SW-3F-01. I am going to schedule a maintenance window to reconfigure the affected ports and will keep you updated.

emails.subject: How do I set up email on my mobile phone?
emails.body_preview: I have a new phone and need to set up my work email on it. Can you provide instructions?
emails.body_content:
Hi,

I have a new phone and need to set up my work email on it. I have an iPhone and would like to use the Outlook app. Can you provide step-by-step instructions or point me to a guide?

emails.subject: RE: How do I set up email on my mobile phone?
emails.body_preview: Hi Leo, I have attached a step-by-step guide for setting up Outlook on iPhone. Please follow the instructions and let me know if you need help.
emails.body_content:
Hi Leo,

Here are the steps to set up Outlook on your iPhone: 1) Download the Outlook app from the App Store, 2) Open the app and tap 'Add Account', 3) Enter your work email address and tap 'Continue', 4) You will be redirected to our company sign-in page where you can enter your password. Please let me know if you have any issues.

emails.subject: MFA not working after phone replacement
emails.body_preview: I replaced my phone and now multi-factor authentication is not working. I cannot log in to any company systems.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

I replaced my phone over the weekend and now multi-factor authentication is not working. The authenticator app on my old phone was not transferred. I cannot log in to any company systems that require MFA. Can you please reset my MFA so I can set it up on my new phone?

emails.subject: RE: MFA not working after phone replacement
emails.body_preview: Hi Mia, I have reset your MFA registration. You will need to re-enrol by visiting the security portal. Can you confirm your employee ID for verification?
emails.body_content:
Hi Mia,

I can reset your MFA registration, but first I need to verify your identity. Could you please confirm your employee ID number and answer your security question? Once verified, I will reset the MFA and you can re-enrol by visiting the security portal at https://security.example.com/mfa.

emails.subject: Request for VPN access for contractor
emails.body_preview: We have a contractor starting next week who will need VPN access to our development environment.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

We have a contractor starting next week who will need VPN access to our development environment. Their name is Alex Carter and they will be working with us for three months. Could you please set up a restricted VPN account with access only to the dev subnet?

emails.subject: Application error when submitting expense reports
emails.body_preview: I keep getting an error message when trying to submit expense reports through the web portal. The page shows a 500 error.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

I keep getting an error message when trying to submit expense reports through the web portal. The page shows a 500 Internal Server Error after I click the submit button. I have tried different browsers but the same thing happens. My report is due by end of week.

emails.subject: Recurring BSOD on accounts department PC
emails.body_preview: My PC keeps getting blue screen errors, usually once or twice a day. The error code is DRIVER_IRQL_NOT_LESS_OR_EQUAL.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

My PC keeps getting blue screen errors, usually once or twice a day. The error code shown is DRIVER_IRQL_NOT_LESS_OR_EQUAL. It started about a week ago and I have lost work several times because of it. Can someone please look at this urgently?

emails.subject: Firewall rule change request for new web application
emails.body_preview: We need a firewall rule change to allow traffic on port 8443 from the DMZ to the internal app server for our new web application.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

We need a firewall rule change to allow traffic on port 8443 from the DMZ to the internal application server (10.0.5.20) for our new web application. The change request form is attached with all the details and risk assessment. Could you please review and implement?

emails.subject: Awaiting replacement part for faulty docking station
emails.body_preview: My docking station is not detecting my external monitors. I have tried different cables but nothing works.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

My docking station is not detecting my external monitors. I have tried different cables and different monitors but the docking station does not seem to output any video signal. I think the docking station itself is faulty. Can I get a replacement?

emails.subject: Password reset request for legacy system
emails.body_preview: I need my password reset for the legacy inventory system. My account has been locked out.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

I need my password reset for the legacy inventory system. My account has been locked out after too many failed attempts. I think I was using an old password. Could you please reset it for me?

emails.subject: Teams calls dropping intermittently
emails.body_preview: Microsoft Teams calls keep dropping after about 10 minutes. This is happening to multiple people in our office.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

Microsoft Teams calls keep dropping after about 10 minutes of conversation. This is happening to multiple people in our office on the 2nd floor. Audio quality also degrades before the call drops. We have important client calls this week and need this fixed urgently.

emails.subject: Install development tools on new workstation
emails.body_preview: I need the following development tools installed on my new workstation: Visual Studio 2022, Git, Node.js, and Docker Desktop.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

I need the following development tools installed on my new workstation: Visual Studio 2022 Professional, Git for Windows, Node.js LTS, and Docker Desktop. I also need local admin rights to install npm packages. Could you please arrange this?

emails.subject: Slow internet speeds in building 2
emails.body_preview: Internet speeds in building 2 have been very slow for the past week. Downloads that used to take seconds now take minutes.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

Internet speeds in building 2 have been very slow for the past week. Downloads that used to take seconds now take minutes, and video conferencing is almost unusable. Multiple people across different floors in building 2 are affected. Building 1 seems fine.

emails.subject: How do I access the company intranet remotely?
emails.body_preview: I will be working from home next week and need to access the company intranet. How do I do this?
emails.body_content:
Hi,

I will be working from home next week and need to access the company intranet site for HR documents and policies. Is this available through the VPN or is there another way to access it remotely? Any guidance would be appreciated.

emails.subject: Laptop keyboard not responding after update
emails.body_preview: After a Windows update last night, my laptop keyboard has stopped working. The touchpad still works fine.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

After a Windows update last night, my laptop keyboard has stopped working completely. The touchpad still works fine, and an external USB keyboard also works. It seems like the update may have broken the keyboard driver. Can you please help?

emails.subject: New user account creation for marketing department
emails.body_preview: We have a new team member joining marketing on Monday. Please create their AD account and email.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

We have a new team member joining the marketing department on Monday. Please create their Active Directory account, email address, and provide access to the marketing shared drive and Teams channels. Their name is Sophie Brown and their start date is next Monday.

emails.subject: Backup job failure on file server FS01
emails.body_preview: The nightly backup job for file server FS01 has failed for the third consecutive night. The error log shows insufficient disk space.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

The nightly backup job for file server FS01 has failed for the third consecutive night. The error log shows insufficient disk space on the backup target. We need to either expand the backup storage or archive older backups to free up space. This is critical as we have no recent backups.

emails.subject: Decommission old test environment servers
emails.body_preview: The old test environment servers (TEST-SRV01 to TEST-SRV04) are no longer needed and can be decommissioned.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

The old test environment servers TEST-SRV01 through TEST-SRV04 are no longer needed as we have migrated to the new cloud-based test environment. Please decommission these servers, remove their DNS entries, and update the asset register accordingly.

emails.subject: Database query performance degradation on reporting server
emails.body_preview: Reports that used to run in under a minute are now taking over 10 minutes on the reporting server.
emails.body_content:
Hi,

Reports that used to run in under a minute are now taking over 10 minutes on the reporting server. The daily sales report and the inventory summary are both affected. This started about a week ago and is getting progressively worse. Can the development team investigate the database performance?

ticket_notes.note_text: Checked remote access logs, user's VPN certificate has expired. Regenerating certificate now.
Identified DNS resolution failure on the outbound mail relay. The secondary DNS server 10.0.1.5 is unreachable. Switching to backup DNS provider temporarily.
HVAC contractor confirmed attendance for tomorrow at 09:00. Portable cooling units deployed as interim measure. Temperature holding steady at 27C.
Packet captures show spanning tree reconvergence events every 15-20 minutes on switch SW-3F-01. Root cause appears to be a misconfigured trunk port. Scheduling maintenance window for fix.
Memory diagnostic tool shows no RAM errors. Running driver verifier to identify the faulty driver causing the BSOD. Will need the machine for 24 hours to collect crash dumps.
Driver verifier identified the Realtek network adapter driver as the cause. Placing on hold pending driver update from manufacturer - current version has a known memory leak issue.
QoS policy was not applied to the 2nd floor switch after last month's firmware upgrade. Reapplied QoS rules prioritising voice/video traffic. Monitoring for 24 hours to confirm fix.
Traced the issue to a faulty uplink cable between the building 2 distribution switch and the core switch. Cable tested at only 100Mbps instead of 1Gbps. Replaced cable and speeds are back to normal.
Archived backup sets older than 90 days to tape storage, freeing 2.1TB on the backup target. Backup job completed successfully overnight. Will monitor for the next three nights to confirm stability.

Identified missing indexes on the sales_transactions and inventory_movements tables. Added appropriate indexes and query execution time dropped from 10 minutes to 8 seconds. Scheduling a full index review for all reporting queries.
